item.title: Biology tests (available in greek only)
item.description: This software is available only in greek.

item.title: Mind control parasites. How do they do it?
item.description: Did you know that there are parasites that can manipulate the behavior of their host organism? Hairworm is such an example. Hairworms are long thin wormlike parasites. Their scientific name is Nematomorpha.

item.title: A consensus method for the prediction of aggregation-prone peptides in globular proteins
item.description: A consensus algorithm for the prediction of amyloidogenic determinants from sequence alone.
